NC.Q: Was the total Content Uploads in 1993 higher or lower than in 1999?
NC.A: The total content uploads in 1993 was {lower} than in 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1997, did the total Content Uploads experience a larger or smaller change than between 1986 and 2002?
NC.A: The change in total content uploads between 1983 and 1997 was {smaller} than between 1986 and 2002.
